title: buds by Shangri-La: Interactive Play Space
blurb: An interactive play space for kids at Shangri-La.
description: buds by Shangri-La is an interactive play space designed for children of all ages. It features a variety of play zones, including a climbing structure, a ball pit, and an art studio. The space also offers a range of activities and programs for kids, such as storytelling, arts and crafts, and cooking classes. buds by Shangri-La is the perfect place for families to spend quality time together and create lasting memories. It provides a safe and stimulating environment where children can learn, play, and grow. The play space is designed to cater to different age groups, ensuring that every child has a fun and engaging experience. Parents can relax and enjoy the facilities while their children explore and discover new things. With its wide range of activities and amenities, buds by Shangri-La is a must-visit destination for families with kids.
price_display: From $45 per child (hotel guests, 3 hours) - $83 (public, 3 hours during peak, with admission to Splash)
